spear_ice.name: Frosted Spear
spear_ice.description: A common weapon among residents of Warren Snowfield. Infused with frost to reflect the local flavor. It's very popular, because it's cheap yet highly effective.

normals.name: Thrust
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **20.1%** of ATK plus **1** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **18.5%** of ATK plus **1** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **38.5%** of ATK plus **2** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **59.2%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **93.8%** of ATK plus **5** and knock the target back a significant distance.

normals.name: Jumping Strike
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **22.3%** of ATK plus **1**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **18.8%** of ATK plus **1**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **37.1%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **89%** of ATK plus **5**.

normals.name: Crashing Drive
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Crashing Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to **6.4%** of ATK plus **1** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **39.3%** of ATK plus **2** and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Spear Flurry
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Spear Flurry.
Upon hit, **strongly suspend** the target, dealing damage equal to **39.8%** of ATK plus **2**. Tap again to continue attacking the airborne target, dealing up to **79.5%** of ATK plus **4** damage to a single target.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Thrust the long spear forward, dealing damage equal to **256.5%** of ATK plus **14**.

dodge.name: Flying Kick
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to **58.2%** of ATK plus **3**, knock the enemies back significantly, and **stun** enemies for **1** second or **0.5** seconds to Wanderers.

dodge.name: Lunging Smash
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Slam the long spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to **42.8%** of ATK plus **2** and **strongly suspending** targets.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Moonchaser
skill.description: **Strongly suspend** targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to **103.1%** of ATK plus **5**. Cooldown: **25** seconds.

discharge.name: Spear Dance
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and grab the target and shake them multiple times, dealing damage equal to **205.4%** of ATK plus **11**. The last hit **strongly suspends** the target.

digger_physic.name: Combat Blade
digger_physic.description: A basic weapon developed by Banges Tech. Forged in a special alloy, it is light, agile, and easy to handle.

normals.name: Twin Blades
normals.description:
While on the ground, brandish the pair of dual blades to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **24.5%** of ATK plus **1** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **29.8%** of ATK plus **2** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **37.1%** of ATK plus **2** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **39.5%** of ATK plus **2** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **82.3%** of ATK plus **4** and knock the target back a short distance.

normals.name: Sky Flurry
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **26.7%** of ATK plus **1**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **15.7%** of ATK plus **1**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **37.4%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **56.4%** of ATK plus **3**.

normals.name: Rapid Lunge
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Upon hit, **strongly suspend** the target, dealing total damage equal to **37.4%** of ATK plus **2**.

normals.name: Spiral Drive
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to **37.4%** of ATK plus **2** each hit.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **256.5%** of ATK plus **14**.

dodge.name: Flying Blades
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades.
Upon hit, **strongly suspend** the target and deal damage equal to **21.5%** of ATK plus **1**. Keep tapping to throw up to **6** more Flying Blades, each dealing damage equal to **8.9%** of ATK plus **1**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Returning Blades
skill.description: Fire **6** Returning Blades in all directions, each dealing damage equal to **0%** of ATK plus **1**. **2**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Orbiting Blades
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleashes orbiting blades that deal **137.3%** of ATK plus **7** damage, with **2** more flying blades spinning around the Wanderer to deal **32%** of ATK plus **2** damage to targets coming into contact.

sword_thunder.name: EM Blade
sword_thunder.description: The earliest electromagnetic Omnium project. The blade is easy to handle, and is very popular among Wanderers that are not great fighters.

normals.name: Quick Slash
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **34.6%** of ATK plus **2** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **30.1%** of ATK plus **2** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **27.4%** of ATK plus **1** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **47.9%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.2%** of ATK plus **4** and **launch** the target.

normals.name: Jumping Strike
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **15.7%** of ATK plus **1**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **25.3%** of ATK plus **1**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **45.1%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **67.4%** of ATK plus **4** and deliver a **knockdown**.

normals.name: Cyclone
normals.description:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal **22.3%** of ATK plus **1** to a single target.

normals.name: Diving Edge
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.
While falling, deal damage equal to **6.4%** of ATK plus **0** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **35.6%** of ATK plus **2** to surrounding targets and knock them back.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **256.5%** of ATK plus **14**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Roam
skill.description: Roam between targets, dealing total damage equal to **227.1%** of ATK plus **12** to up to **5** targets, with the last hit suspending the target. Immune to hitstun while active. Reduce damage dealt to the same target by **40%** each time. **10**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Unbridled Flurry
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer**, then rush to the target and **strongly suspend** them, dealing damage equal to **266.6%** of ATK plus **14**.

bow_fire.name: Composite Bow
bow_fire.description: A common weapon used by hunters in the snowfield. Easy to handle with very high accuracy. After enough promotion, it has earned more than half of the affordable civilian market.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **27.3%** of ATK plus **1**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **24.4%** of ATK plus **1**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **43.8%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **67.8%** of ATK plus **4**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **62.9%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.

normals.name: Charged Arrow
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to **49.1%** of ATK plus **3**, and **50%** more for each **1** second spent charging, up to **3** seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

normals.name: Arrow Rain
normals.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to **160%** of ATK plus **8** area damage to targets.

normals.name: Air Volley
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **31.5%** of ATK plus **2**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **41.4%** of ATK plus **2**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **63%** of ATK plus **3**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **94.8%** of ATK plus **5**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Loaded Arrow
dodge.description: Tap attack after dodging to trigger Loaded Arrow, knocking the target back by a short distance and dealing damage equal to **69.3%** of ATK plus **4**.

skill.name: Piercing Shot
skill.description: Backflips and fires **1** piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to **125.4%** of ATK plus **7** and knocking the target back. **12**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Explosive Barrage
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Explosive Barrage on the target, dealing damage equal to **396%** of ATK plus **21**.

stave_thunder.name: Staff of Scars
stave_thunder.description: A mechanical staff with a cross rune carved into it. Capable of both forgiving sins or unleashing punishments.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **33.9%** of ATK plus **2**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **25.4%** of ATK plus **1**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **41%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **56.1%** of ATK plus **3**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **98.8%** of ATK plus **5**.

normals.name: Soaring Barrage
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **43.9%** of ATK plus **2**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **31.7%** of ATK plus **2**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **34.4%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **61.6%** of ATK plus **3**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **64.3%** of ATK plus **3**.

normals.name: Moonfall
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall.
Upon landing, deal damage once every **0.2** seconds, for a total of **77.2%** of ATK plus **4** damage.

normals.name: Focused Assault
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming **300** points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, **strongly suspending** them and deal damage equal to **21.7%** of ATK plus **1** every **0.3** seconds (up to **4** times).
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **25.2%** of ATK plus **1** at the target location and to nearby enemies every **0.3** seconds.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Surge
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Surge.
Each energy pulse deals damage equal to **30.5%** of ATK plus **2** to targets.
Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

dodge.name: Tesseract
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast.
Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to **43.3%** of ATK plus **2** to targets in its path every **0.3** seconds (up to 5 times).
Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

skill.name: Sanctuary
skill.description: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for **81.7%** of ATK plus **4** every second and reduce their damage taken by **3%** for **10** seconds. **60**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Swift Deliverance
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus heals nearby Wanderers and allies for **79%** of ATK plus **4** HP for **7** seconds.

advancements.description: Heal all teammates within **10** meters for **100%** of ATK after using a dodge skill.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **10%**.
Normal attacks also fire two missiles, each dealing damage equal to **5%** of ATK to the target and restoring **5** weapon charge points.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **20%**.
Increase speed of obtaining weapon charge by **20%** (not applicable to missile attacks).
Grant all teammates within range **60%** damage reduction whenever a skill dispels control effects from the target.

cannon_ice.name: The Terminator
cannon_ice.description: The most gnarly firearm ever created, also known as a moving turret.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to **40** rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to **15.4%** of ATK plus **1**. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Turret
skill.description: Enable turret mode and fire large energy orbs, each dealing damage equal to **287.9%** of ATK plus **15** and launching the target into the air. Become immune to hitstun and control effects while setting up the turret. Cooldown: **3.5** seconds.

discharge.name: Arctic Beam
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and fire an arctic beam, dealing damage equal to **444.5%** of ATK plus **23** and inflict a **3**-second **strong freeze** effect. Also, reduce the target's frost resistance by **50%** for **10** seconds.

advancements.description: Every successful normal attack increases damage by **1%** for **2** seconds. Stack up to **15** times. Increase ammo count to **60**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **10%**.
Within **10** seconds of switching to the weapon, increase damage of normal attacks and shatter by **30%**. Cooldown: **25** seconds. Increase ammo to **80**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **20%**.
Reduce cooldown of normal attacks while in turret mode by **2** seconds.
Within **10** seconds upon switching to the weapon, increase damage of normal attacks and shatter by **60%**. Cooldown: **25** seconds.

chainsaw_physic.name: Mini Hurricane
chainsaw_physic.description: Far too dangerous to be a child's plaything. There is no way a kid could have gotten their hands on it through honest means. Who knows what kind of tech was used to refit it... Maybe it was simply picked up somewhere off the beaten path.

normals.name: Speedy Blow
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **60.4%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **70.9%** of ATK plus **4** and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **58.8%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **160.4%** of ATK plus **8** and continuously knocking the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **172.9%** of ATK plus **9** and launch the target.

normals.name: Whirling Blow
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.1%** of ATK plus **4**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **60.3%** of ATK plus **3**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **55.4%** of ATK plus **3**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **100.7%** of ATK plus **5**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **134.7%** of ATK plus **7**.

normals.name: Frantic Digging
normals.description:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack for the first to third normal attack to trigger Frantic Digging.
Continuously attack forward in place while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage to nearby targets equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **2** and causes the target to become **grievous**, lasting **7** seconds.

normals.name: Boiling Octopus Balls
normals.description:
During Frantic Digging, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Boiling Octopus Balls.
Continuously attack forward while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **2** to nearby targets. Once normal attack is released, deal damage equal to **44.1%** of ATK plus **2** to nearby targets and cause them to become **grievous** for **7** seconds.
Use the directional controls to move during Boiling Octopus Balls.

normals.name: Go on, Pip!
normals.description:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack or hold during the fourth normal attack to trigger Go on, Pip!
Continuously move forward while attacking and consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **2** to nearby targets, knocking the target back and causing them to become **grievous**, lasting for **7** seconds.
Use the directional controls to move during Go on, Pip!

normals.name: Waterspout Spike
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Waterspout Spike.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to **167.2%** of ATK plus **9** to nearby targets upon reaching the ground, and launching them.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

dodge.name: Tentacle Counter
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Tentacle Counter, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **37.8%** of ATK plus **2**.
**Passive**: Delay targets by **60%**, and deal damage equal to **18%** of ATK per second, lasting **5** seconds. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **10** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

dodge.name: Pursuing Tentacle
dodge.description: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Pursuing Tentacle, dealing damage equal to **106.3%** of ATK plus **6** to nearby targets.

skill.name: Exploration Team Strike
skill.description:
Enter a charging state and become temporarily invincible (unavailable in Apex League). Draw in nearby targets, dealing damage to them equal to **29.4%** of ATK plus **2** each time an attack lands. Cooldown: **20** seconds (cooldown starts upon entering charging state).
Upon releasing, detonate all **Treasure Tracers** on nearby targets and cause **Octowhip** to enter a Rampage state, increasing the speed of coordinated attacks by **100%**, lasting for **12** seconds.

Different release timings can be chosen depending on the number of **Minisquids** above the Wanderer.
**Total Berserk**: When the number of **Minisquids** equals **2**, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to **588%** of ATK plus **31**.
**Partial Berserk**: When the number of **Minisquids** is **1** or **3**, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to **411.6%** of ATK plus **22**.

**Prowling Clones**: Gain **15** **Octowhips** when in combat, which attack locked-on targets, dealing damage equal to **115%** of ATK and consuming **1** Octowhip each time an attack lands. A maximum of **30** Octowhips can be stored at a time.
**Pip Octowhip** Place **1** **Treasure Tracer** on targets each time they are hit by an Octowhip which lasts for **20** seconds, for a maximum of **3** stacks.
Detonate **1** **Treasure Tracer** stack whenever physical damage aside from **Octowhip** is dealt to a target, dealing damage equal to **20%** of ATK. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **0.1** seconds.
Gain **1** Octowhip whenever a discharge skill from any weapon hits a target. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **0.1** seconds.

discharge.name: Pip Ultimate
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and briefly submerge the Wanderer, dealing damage to nearby targets equal to **265.2%** of ATK +**14** upon emerging. Upon landing, deal damage to nearby targets equal to **618.8%** of ATK + **33**, and gain the maximum number of **Pip Octowhip**. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.description:
**Physical Resonance**: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.
**Universal Resonance**: Increase final damage by **15%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of the same element, not including physical. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.

Increase the shatter of Frantic Digging, Boiling Octopus Balls, and Go on, Pip! by **80%**.
Gain a **50%** increase to Shield when these skills are used when the Wanderer's Shield is below **50%**. Lasts **8** seconds. This effect can only be triggered **1** time every **5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

**Pip Octowhip** limit is increased to **45**.
After using Pip Ultimate, increase physical damage by **12%** for **30** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Detonating **Treasure Tracers** refreshes the **grievous** status of targets.
Increase physical damage by **10%** when damage is dealt to targets with less than **80%** HP. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase damage dealt by detonating **Treasure Tracers** to **90%** of ATK.

hammer_ice.name: Pummeler
hammer_ice.description: No one wants to be on the receiving end of this maul.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **103%** of ATK plus **5** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **83.9%** of ATK plus **4** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **212.4%** of ATK plus **11** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **356.2%** of ATK plus **19** and launch the target.
While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **102%** of ATK plus **5** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **87.8%** of ATK plus **5** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **231.3%** of ATK plus **12** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **425.7%** of ATK plus **22** and **strongly suspend** the target.

normals.name: Pummel
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Deal damage equal to **164.3%** of ATK plus **9**and suspend the target.
While Outburst is active, deal damage equal to **180.7%** of ATK plus **10** and **strongly suspend** the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Shockwave
normals.description:
Tapping and holding while airborne, double-jumping, short tapping in the air when there are targets nearby, climbing, jumping backward, or attacking while using the Jetpack will trigger a Shockwave. **Strongly suspend** the target **4** times, dealing damage equal to **47%** of ATK+ **2** each time. Cost **250** endurance.
While Outburst is active, Shockwave **strongly suspends** the target **5** times, dealing damage equal to **51.7%** of *ATK plus **3** each time.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **427.5%** of ATK plus **23**.

normals.name: Focus Smash
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack to trigger Focus Smash (can be charged up to 3 stacks). Grant immunity to all control effects and hyperbody while charging.
First Stack: Deal damage equal to **207.6%** of ATK plus **11** and suspend the target.
Second Stack: Deal damage equal to **519.1%** of ATK plus **27** and **strongly suspend** the target.
Third Stack: Deal damage equal to **973.2%** of ATK plus **51** and **strongly suspend** the target.
While Outburst is active, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Furious Strikes, dealing damage equal to **676.7%** of ATK plus **36** and **strongly suspend** the target.

dodge.name: Jumping Smash
dodge.description: Use the arrow buttons and the dodge button to trigger Jumping Smash, unleashing a Shockwave that suspends the enemy **4** times, dealing damage equal to **218%** of ATK plus **11**.

dodge.name: Worldsplitter
dodge.description:

advancements.description: Increase shatter by **15%**. After shattering the target's shield, deal burn damage equal to **120%** of ATK to the target every second for **15** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
Increase damage dealt by **15%** for each enemy target within **6** meters, up to **30%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Increase damage dealt against HP shields or shielded enemies by **100%**.
Increase damage dealt by **10%** for each enemy slain for **30** seconds. Stack up to **3** times.

gun_fire.name: Flaming Revolver
gun_fire.description: Invented by a mad scientist. With its impressive test numbers, one can only imagine how powerful it might be at full power.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
On the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row.
The first attack deals total damage equal to **52.3%** of ATK + **3**.
The second attack deals total damage equal to **75.6%** of ATK + **4**.
The third attack deals total damage equal to **94.5%** of ATK + **5**.
The fourth attack deals total damage equal to **142.8%** of ATK + **8** .
The fifth attack deals total damage equal to **137.8%** of ATK + **7**.

normals.name: Charged Shot
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release to fire rounds, dealing **95.4%** of ATK plus **5** damage, plus an explosion 3 seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing **23.9%** of ATK as damage to nearby enemies. Each time the target is dealt damage during the explosion (up to **4** times), AoE is doubled and damage is increased.

normals.name: Jumping Blast
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, launch Jumping Blast.
Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to **90.8%** of ATK plus **5** to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a short distance. Consumes **250** endurance.

normals.name: Aerial Discharge
normals.description:
After double-jumping, launch Aerial Discharge in mid-air.
Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to **33.8%** of ATK plus **2**.

normals.name: Heavy Bombardment
normals.description: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, dealing enemies AoE damage equal to **102%** of ATK plus **5** in total.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Close Quarters
dodge.description:
Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Close Quarters.
Deal damage equal to **156.1%** of ATK plus **8** to targets in a frontal cone area.

skill.name: Barrage
skill.description: Continuously inflict damage in a frontal cone area, dealing total damage equal to **705.1%** of ATK plus **37**. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

discharge.name: Explosive Rain
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and throw **3** grenades forward, dealing AoE damage equal to **570%** of ATK plus **30** in total and **launching** the target.

advancements.description: **Flame Resonance**: Increase flame ATK by **15%** and flame resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.
Each round of Barrage deals additional damage equal to **0%** of the target's current HP (cannot exceed **1%** of ATK).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Heavy Bombardment branch skill and Close Quarters dodge attack inflict **Ion Scorch** on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to **40%** of ATK every second for **10** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
The damage from **Ion Scorch** increases to **60%** of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill will refresh the duration of **Ion Scorch**.

**Barrage** has a **15**-second burning effect. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill reduces the cooldown of **Barrage** by **4** seconds. The cooldown of the effect: **1.5** seconds. The DoT burn from the dodge skill also triggers a cooldown reduction effect.

sword_physic.name: Guren Blade
sword_physic.description: The crimson blade stands for courage and resolve, while the sharp edge carries out justice.

normals.name: Quick Slash
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **62.2%** of ATK plus **2** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **87%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **78.8%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **138.3%** of ATK plus **7** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **236.3%** of ATK plus **12** and **launch** the target.

normals.name: Jumping Strike
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **37.1%** of ATK plus **1**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **64.4%** of ATK plus **3**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **152.3%** of ATK plus **8**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **184.7%** of ATK plus **9** and deliver a **knockdown**.

normals.name: Cyclone
normals.description:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal **50.2%** of ATK plus **3** to a single target.

normals.name: Diving Edge
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.
While falling, deal damage equal to **10.5%** of ATK plus **1** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **80.2%** of ATK plus **4** to surrounding targets and knock them back.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK plus **30**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Leap Attack
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack.
The Wanderer swings their blade forward and deals damage equal to **39.8%** of ATK plus **2** to the target, **strongly suspending** them while going airborne. Then, deal additional damage equal to **59.6%** of ATK plus **3** to the target.

skill.name: Roam
skill.description: Roam through targets while swinging the blade, dealing total damage equal to **418%** of ATK plus **22** to up to **5** targets (damage dealt by each consecutive hit on the same target will be reduced by **20%** from the previous hit). After Roam has concluded, slash the space in front, dealing area damage equal to **264%** of ATK plus **14** to surrounding targets and suspending them. Become immune to control effects while skill is in use, and all damage taken is reduced by **50%**. Cooldown: **15** seconds.

discharge.name: Unbridled Flurry
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer**, then rush to the target and **strongly suspend** them, dealing **523.3%** of ATK plus **28** damage, leaving behind a Bladestorm that deals **209.6%** of ATK plus **11** damage, while gaining immunity to grievous/freeze/burn/electrify effects for **5** seconds.

advancements.description: **Physical Resonance**: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

After hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, gain 1 stack of the following buff: Increase damage dealt by **8%** for **25** seconds, stacking up to **3** times, for a maximum of 1 stack per skill use.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

When hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, apply 1 stack of War Wounds to the target: Increase incoming physical damage and shatter from physical weapons by **0%** for **1 seconds**. Stack up to **1** time.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Hitting targets with skills or discharge skills grants Skill Damage Boost, which increases all weapon skill damage by **0%** for **1 seconds**. This effect cannot be stacked.
Skills hitting the same target no longer have reduced damage. After using Guren Blade's skills or discharge skill, all targets with War Wounds within 8 meters gain another **1** stack of War Wounds.

darts_physic.name: Chakram of the Seas
darts_physic.description: A round and sharp weapon that traveled the seas with its owner.

normals.name: Rapid Throw
normals.description:
While on the ground, brandish the chakram to unleash 5 spinning attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **35.3%** of ATK plus **2**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **27.4%** of ATK plus **1**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **39.1%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **35.3%** of ATK plus **2**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **61.9%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.

normals.name: Aerial Discharge
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to unleash 3 spinning attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **30.1%** of ATK plus **1**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **33.6%** of ATK plus **2**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **42.8%** of ATK plus **2**.

normals.name: Scatter
normals.description:
After the second normal attack, hold attack button to activate Scatter.
Fire five penetrating chakrams forward, each hit dealing **50%** of ATK plus **2** damage, with minor knockback.

normals.name: Air Spin
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Air Spin.
Unleash a powerful strike, dealing damage equal to **220.2%** of ATK plus **12** to the target and nearby enemies, and suspend them.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **491.6%** of ATK plus **26**.

dodge.name: Waning Moon
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Waning Moon.
Toss a spinning chakram forward, dealing damage equal to **152.8%** of ATK plus **8** to the target and inflicting a **stun** effect for **0.5** seconds. The chakram then splits into **3** and keeps traveling, dealing damage equal to **27.8%** of ATK plus **1** to targets along their path. **Split chakrams will bounce during Full Bloom**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Full Bloom
skill.description: Create a Chakram Domain with the Wanderer at the center for **8** seconds. At the same time, enemies are pulled in, and their speed is reduced by **30%** for **8** seconds. Fire **5** chakrams that bounce between enemies, dealing damage equal to **27.8%** of ATK plus **1** to targets along their paths, bouncing up to **5** times. **The split chakrams triggered by Waning Moon will also bounce up to 5 times.** Cooldown: **45** seconds.

discharge.name: Spirit of the Air
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Chakram of the Seas at a target. Struck target causes AoE **stun** for **1** second, plus **1** attack each against up to **3** units every second (each attack has **10%** chance of **stunning** the target for **1.5** seconds), dealing **49.7%** x ATK plus **2** damage for **10** seconds.

advancements.description: Increase damage dealt to and all elemental shattering effects on targets within **Full Bloom**'s range by **30%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Increase shatter by **15%** and reset all weapon skill cooldowns upon shattering the target's shield. Can only be triggered once every **30** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Attacking a grievous target extends the duration of grievous by an additional **7** seconds (only takes effect once for the same effect).
After using **Full Bloom**, grant a 100% crit chance for the next **8** seconds.

cube_fire.name: Negating Cube
cube_fire.description: Users of the Strange Cube tend to think of many ways to negate unnecessary requirements.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, manipulate the cube to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **56%** of ATK plus **2**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **45.8%** of ATK plus **2**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **142.2%** of ATK plus **10**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **95.5%** of ATK plus **5**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **97.1%** of ATK plus **5** up to 3 times and **launch** the target.
**Passive: If normal attacks hit targets 6 times, gain 1 cube. Up to 5 cubes can be stored.**

normals.name: Omnium Missile
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to activate the energy within the cube, firing up to **5** missiles and dealing total damage equal to **71.2%** of ATK plus **4**. Consume up to **250** endurance.
**Passive: If the Wanderer has any stored cubes, consume all cubes to fire Omnium Missiles at targets to deal damage.**

normals.name: Energy Overflow
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Energy Overflow.
Upon landing, fire a shockwave that travels forward, dealing up to **28.1%** of ATK plus **1** damage to targets in its path.

normals.name: Omnium Shock
normals.description:
On the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Omnium Shock.
A pillar of energy launches nearby targets into the air, dealing damage equal to **82.1%** of ATK plus **5**. The pillar lasts 5 seconds and deals damage equal to **34.2%** of ATK plus **2** to nearby targets every second.

normals.name: Energy Sentinel
normals.description: Cubes orbiting the Wanderer deal damage equal to **11.6%** of ATK plus **1** to enemies.

normals.name: Energy Missile
normals.description: When the Wanderer casts Omnium Missiles and Energy Overflow, their orbiting cubes are fired as well, dealing damage equal to **48.5%** of ATK plus **3** to the target.

dodge.name: Soul Surge
dodge.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.
If the Wanderer has less than **5** cubes, each successful dodge has a **40%** chance to restore 1 dodge attempt.
Successful dodges do not interrupt normal attack combos.
**Passive: Gain a cube for every successful aerial dodge.**

skill.name: Omnium Shield
skill.description: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to **800%** of ATK in damage for **10** seconds, deal **142.9%** of ATK plus **8** damage to nearby targets and **strongly launch** them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds **160%** of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

discharge.name: Omnium Wave
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and gain **5** cubes, then unleash the **5** cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to **171%** of ATK plus **9** to nearby targets, and **strongly launches** them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to **48.5%** of ATK plus **3**. If allies are in the vicinity, the allies and the wielder gain damage immunity for **3** seconds.

advancements.description:
**Flame Reaction**: Increase flame ATK by **20%** and flame resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.
**Flame Benediction**: Increase entire team's flame ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is activated.
Deal damage and produce a healing orb which lasts for **20** seconds and restores the HP of any teammate who picks it up. The HP restored is equal to **60%** of ATK. **2**-second cooldown.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Reduce skill cooldown from **60** seconds to **30** seconds. Restore HP equal to **30%** of ATK every second while the shield is active.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.

Damaging a target also produces a damage orb, which lasts for **20** seconds and increases all damage and healing of any teammate who picks it up by **2%** for **30** seconds. Stack up to **10** times. Skill cooldown is **2.5** seconds.
Using a Skill grants allies healing orbs and damage orbs equal to the number of Omnium Cubes.

dgun_thunder.name: Dual EM Stars
dgun_thunder.description: These firearms are designed based on railguns, and must be used in a pair.

normals.name: Dual Fire
normals.description:
Tap normal attack while on the ground to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks with the dual pistols.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to **56.5%** of ATK plus **2**.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to **43%** of ATK plus **2**.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to **143.6%** of ATK plus **7**.
Fourth attack: Deal total damage equal to **135.7%** of ATK plus **7**.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to **184.8%** of ATK plus **10** and **launch** the target.

normals.name: Bullet Rain
normals.description: While airborne, use normal attack to fire continuously at the ground, dealing damage equal to **54.3%** of ATK plus **4** damage, each hit consumes **150** endurance.

normals.name: Energy Burst
normals.description: Hold attack button to maintain constant fire, each hit dealing **27.6%** of ATK plus **1** base damage.

normals.name: Phantom Kick
normals.description: While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Phantom Kick. Knock the target down and deal damage equal to **84.6%** of ATK plus **5**. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **118.4%** of ATK plus **6** to nearby targets and **strongly launch** them.

dodge.name: Rising Lightning Kick
dodge.description: Tap normal attack after dodging to **strongly suspend** targets and deal damage equal to **147.1%** of ATK plus **7**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Electro Field
skill.description: Fire an energy shield at the target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to **323.8%** of ATK plus **17**, and the last hit **strongly suspends** targets. Cooldown: **45**-seconds.

discharge.name: Domain of Thunder
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and create a Domain of Thunder at the target location, **strongly suspending** targets within range and dealing a total of **286%** of ATK plus **16** damage over 3 attacks to them while dispelling their buffs. The domain lasts for **3.5** seconds and deals damage equal to **50.9%** of ATK plus **2** to a target every **0.5** seconds.

advancements.description: Trigger an electrical explosion on the target after landing a critical hit, dealing additional damage equal to **30%** of ATK to the target and nearby enemies. Cooldown: **0.2** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Increase crit rate to electrified targets by **40%**. Electrical explosions extend the duration of electrified effects by **0.5** seconds, up to a maximum of **5** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Double the duration of Electro Field and pull targets into the center of the attack.
Triggering an electrical explosion reduces skill cooldowns by **1** second.

shieldaxe_fire.name: Molten Shield V2
shieldaxe_fire.description: A shield axe that belongs to the V2 weapon series, a collection of weapons forged with special techniques.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the shield axe to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to **77.7%** of ATK plus **4** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **56.9%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **62.8%** of ATK plus **3** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **184%** of ATK plus **10** and **launch the target into the air**.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to **135.2%** of ATK plus **7** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **79.4%** of ATK plus **4** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **119.9%** of ATK plus **6** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **221.3%** of ATK plus **12** and knock the target back.

normals.name: Aerial Strike
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, attack 3 times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to **75.9%** of ATK plus **4**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **80.2%** of ATK plus **4**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **103%** of ATK plus **5**.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to **118.6%** of ATK plus **6**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **91.1%** of ATK plus **5**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **277.9%** of ATK plus **15**.

normals.name: Anticipation
normals.description:
Shield Form: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to enter shield form (release to exit) for **3** seconds, during which the Wanderer is unable to move, and all damage taken is reduced by **50%**. While in shield form, releasing the normal attack button after taking damage or after holding the button for **3** seconds unleashes fire crash, dealing damage equal to **167.3%** of ATK plus **9** and inflicting a **1**-second **stun** effect on the target.
Axe Form: Smash the target, dealing damage equal to **122.2%** of ATK plus **6** and suspending the target.

normals.name: Valor
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger aerial branch attacks.
Shield Form: While falling, deal damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK plus **1** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **89.2%** of ATK plus **5** and suspend the target.
Axe Form: While falling, deal damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK plus **1** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **128.3%** of ATK plus **7** and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

dodge.name: Erupt
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flaming shield, dealing damage equal to **55.8%** of ATK plus **3** and knocking back targets. In addition, trigger an explosion that deals damage equal to **55.8%** of ATK plus **3**, **stun** targets for **0.5** seconds, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by **30%** for **10** seconds.
Axe Form: Swing an axe to deal damage equal to **226.3%** of ATK plus **12**, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by **30%** for **10** seconds.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Fission
skill.description:
Shield Conversion: Switch from shield form to axe form and smash the ground, dealing damage equal to **373.8%** of ATK plus **20**, plus additional damage equal to **4%** of the Wanderer's Max HP, and **strongly suspending** the target. Leave a large flame zone for **5** seconds that burns the target, dealing continuous damage equal to **233.6%** of ATK plus **12**.
Axe Conversion: Switch from axe form to shield form and slam it to the ground, dealing damage equal to **309.5%** of ATK plus **16** to the target, plus additional damage equal to **4%** of the Wanderer's Max HP, and knocking them back. Prevent the target from switching weapons for **5** seconds upon being hit.
Cooldown: **25** seconds. Shield Conversion and Axe Conversion share a cooldown.

discharge.name: Seething Rage
discharge.description: When **weapon charge is full** or when **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash a flame shockwave, dealing damage equal to **352%** of ATK plus **19**, plus additional damage equal to **5%** of the Wanderer's Max HP. Taunt enemies for **5** seconds, during which gain **15%** damage reduction. Scatter shield-shaped objects based on the number of targets taunted, which last within the area for **20** seconds. Upon pickup, objects provide **10** seconds of **5%** damage reduction (stackable) and immediately restore 1 dodge attempt.

advancements.description: Gain a stack of Strong Shield upon using discharge: Seething Rage. Using a dodge skill or branch skill while in shield form grants a stack of Strong Shield, which grants **10%** damage reduction for **15** seconds and stacks up to **3** times. Switching to axe form converts all Strong Shield stacks to Sharp Axe stacks, each of which increases damage by **15%** for **15** seconds. Switching to a different weapon cancels this effect.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
While in shield form, branch/dodge attacks deal additional damage to targets equal to **4%** of the user's current HP.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

After switching to a shield axe, immediately grant **30%** damage reduction that diminishes by **10%** every **3** seconds, down to a minimum of **10%**. Switching weapons cancels this effect. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

Enhance conversion skills.
Shield Conversion Enhancement: Increases skill damage dealt by **60%** and expands the radius of the flame zone by **30%**.
Axe Conversion Enhancement: Does not share cooldown with Shield Conversion. For the next **5** seconds after using this skill, turns all damage received into HP (up to a maximum of **15%** of the user's Max HP).

mimi_thunder.name: Azure Dragon
mimi_thunder.description:
A pair of fans that contains enormous energy capable of collapsing mountains and tearing the world apart.
When Azure Dragon mounts the clouds, the world is buffeted by the wind.

normals.name: Pearls & Jades
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **91.1%** of ATK plus **5**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **137.6%** of ATK plus **7**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **400%** of ATK plus **21**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **331.7%** of ATK plus **17**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **165.3%** of ATK plus **9**.

normals.name: Seeing Sights
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **92.6%** of ATK plus **5**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **150.5%** of ATK plus **8**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **413.3%** of ATK plus **22**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **284.6%** of ATK plus **15**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **184.6%** of ATK plus **10**.

normals.name: Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun
normals.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to **329.7%** of ATK plus **17** to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.

normals.name: Thunder Burst
normals.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.
Continuously fire lightning at targets, consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to **53.5%** of ATK plus **3** to nearby targets. At the same time, summon **1** Azura every **1.5** seconds that fire shockwaves, dealing damage equal to **99%** of ATK plus **5** to nearby targets.
The Wanderer gains a shield equal to **10%** of Max HP every **1.5** seconds, stacking up to **15%**, lasting for **15** seconds from the creation of the first shield.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Whenever Thunder Burst's shockwave lands a hit, nearby targets are taunted for **2** seconds.
Every time Thunder Burst produces a shield, nearby teammates will additionally receive a shield up to **10%** of the Wanderer's Max HP.

normals.name: Roving Dragon
normals.description:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Roving Dragon and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to **329.7%** of ATK plus **17** to nearby targets and suspending them.

normals.name: Qinglong's Might
normals.description:
Every **3** normal attacks landed while using Azure Dragon grants **1** stack of Qinglong's Might, stacking up to **8** times, for **30** seconds.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Each stack of Qinglong's Might reduces the Wanderer's damage taken by **1.5%**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
**Passive**: Launch a lightning ball ahead.

dodge.name: Lightning Flash
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lightning Flash.
Instantly appear at lightning ball's location, dealing damage equal to **106.4%** of ATK plus **6** to nearby targets and produce a lightning pool, then return to the Wanderer's original location. The lightning pool will deal a total DoT equal to **149.5%** of ATK plus **8** and continuously draw in nearby targets.
**Passive:** During Lightning Flash, the Wanderer receives hyperbody. After Lightning Flash lands a hit, receive **1** stack of Qinglong's Might.
After triggering Lightning Flash, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.

skill.name: Azure Moon
skill.description:
An azure dragon soars through the sky. During this time, grant hyperbody to the Wanderer and deal damage equal to **1777.5%** of ATK plus **94** to nearby targets. The azure dragon will circle for **8** seconds. During this time, continuously consume Qinglong's Might and summon up to **8** lightning strikes. Every lightning strike deals damage equal to **649.9%** of ATK plus **34** to nearby targets, and when the azure dragon disappears, deal damage again equal to **1485%** of ATK plus **78** to nearby targets.
Cooldown: **30** seconds and this cooldown cannot be lowered below **20** seconds. Azure Moon can accumulate up to **2** stacks of skill uses.
**Passive:** When **3** volt weapons are equipped, after Azure Moon lands a hit, deal skill damage equal to **250%** of ATK to the target every **2** seconds for **30** seconds.

discharge.name: Soaring Dragon
discharge.description:
When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and gather chi. Then smash the ground, causing an explosion, dealing damage equal to **1514.7%** of ATK plus **80** to nearby targets and suspending them. During the period, gain damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
**Passive:** When Phantasia is triggered, if Azure Dragon is currently equipped or if switching to Azure Dragon from another weapon, deal damage equal to **5,000%** of ATK to nearby targets. This damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats. This can only be triggered up to 1 time per Phantasia trigger.

advancements.description:
**Volt Resonance**: Increase volt ATK by **15%** and volt resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

**Thunderboom: On-Field**: When landing any hit with **Azure Dragon**, it deals damage to nearby targets equal to **131.3%** of volt ATK plus **1.9%** of the Wanderer's Max HP plus **68.8%** of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus **250%** of crit. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time every **1.5** seconds. The Thunderboom damage is counted as normal attack damage. If there is **1** flame/frost/physical weapon of any kind equipped, Thunderboom damage is multiplied by **1.3** times. Additionally, Thunderboom damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

Each time after **Thunder Burst** charges, **2** Azuras will appear. Each Azura will restore **20%** Max HP to other summons.
Increase **Thunder Burst**'s charged attack and shockwave damage by **30%**.
After using **Azure Moon**, immediately gain **3** stacks of Qinglong's Might. Using other volt weapons' skills will grant **1** stack of Qinglong's Might instead.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

When **Azure Dragon** is equipped, reduce all volt weapon base skill cooldowns by **20%**. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
Additionally, increase the Wanderer's volt damage by **15%**. This effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

When the Wanderer receives lethal damage, prevent lethal damage 1 time and gain damage immunity for a short duration. This effect can only trigger 1 time every **60** seconds and works in the off-hand slot.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Using **Soaring Dragon** draws in nearby targets, ignoring hyperbody (ineffective against bosses).
In team play, **Thunder Burst** will produce **1** volt timestamp every **6** seconds while charging, which will link up in the order they are produced to form a power grid. The power grid can block enemies' movements and their projectile damage. Each volt timestamp lasts for up to **20** seconds.
After using **Azure Moon**, increase the Wanderer's volt damage by **10%** and final damage by **10%** for **30** seconds.

nanyin_superpower.name: Purple Bamboo
nanyin_superpower.description: Purple Bamboo uses music and rhythm to utilize field energy for combat. After the Hendeca County Calamity, when Nan Yin reappeared, her flute also carried terrifying Darkness energy. Whenever Nan Yin played it, countless lives would be turned into dark wretches and fall under its control.

normals.name: Range Resonance
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **60%** of ATK plus **3**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **84%** of ATK plus **4**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **86%** of ATK plus **5**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **143%** of ATK plus **8**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **820%** of ATK plus **43**.

normals.name: Omni Resonance
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **60%** of ATK plus **3**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **88%** of ATK plus **5**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **86%** of ATK plus **5**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **138%** of ATK plus **7**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **780%** of ATK plus **41**.

normals.name: Darkshadow Blast
normals.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first/second/third/fourth normal attack to trigger Darkshadow Blast and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to **148%** of ATK plus **8** / **295%** of ATK plus **16** / **443%** of ATK plus **23** to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Darkshadow Blast, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Surge.

normals.name: Rift Surge
normals.description:
After triggering Darkshadow Blast, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Surge and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage up to **806%** of ATK plus **42** to nearby targets and suspending them.

normals.name: Darkshadow Burst
normals.description:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first/second/third/fourth normal attack to trigger Darkshadow Burst and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to **155%** of ATK plus **8** / **310%** of ATK plus **16** / **465%** of ATK plus **24** to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Darkshadow Burst, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Eruption.

normals.name: Rift Eruption
normals.description:
While on the ground, after triggering Darkshadow Burst, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Eruption and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to **871%** of ATK plus **46** to nearby targets and suspending them.
Damage varies based on the duration normal attack is held, up to a maximum of 1.5 times damage.

normals.name: Void Abyss Current
normals.description: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to create an abyss current at the current location. Tap the mark on the map to transmit to that location, or to change the settings for that abyss current. Up to **2** abyss currents may be created.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

dodge.name: Vortex Field
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Vortex Field.
Create Dark Matter at the target location, dealing damage equal to **180%** of ATK plus **9** to nearby targets. When nearby targets come close to the Dark Matter, a Vortex Field will form and draw them in.
When the Wanderer passes by the Vortex Field, gain Dimensional Guard for **15** seconds, blocking damage from the locked-on target **1** time (no more than **300%** of the Wanderer's Max HP). Dimensional Guard can only be triggered **1** time every **15** seconds.

dodge.name: Butterfly Dance
dodge.description:
While in **team play**, after dodging with Purple Bamboo, summon **1** butterfly that follows the Wanderer for **60** seconds.
After activating Attack Resonance or Balance Resonance, the butterfly flies around the locked-on target and creates a composition with its trails, dealing damage equal to **300%** of ATK to targets that pass through it.
After activating Fortitude Resonance, place a **65%** delay on targets that pass through the composition for **2** seconds, and grant a shield equal to **10%** of the Wanderer's Max HP to the Wanderer and teammates for **15** seconds when they pass through the composition. This effect can occur up to **1** time per second, stacking up to **2** times.
After activating Benediction Resonance, consume the butterfly to immediately help up a knocked-down teammate.

skill.name: Hyperdimensional Field
skill.description:
Activate Hyperdimensional Field, gaining temporary invincibility, dealing damage equal to **650%** of ATK plus **34** to nearby targets, and placing a **65%** delay for **3** seconds on the targets (ineffective against bosses in team play). At the same time, the **Void Trace** on the field immediately executes its skill. Cooldown: **60** seconds.
Ascend into the air and generate a field, placing nearby targets into a High-Dimensional Space that lasts up to **60** seconds, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody, and Purple Bamboo's damage dealt to targets in the High-Dimensional Space ignores shields.
The High-Dimensional Space gains energy equal to **2** plus **number of targets within the Space** every second, and triggers Dimensional Collapse at **45** energy, dealing damage equal to (**0.1%** of the total damage dealt by the Wanderer (excluding Void Trace) in the Space plus **1200%** of ATK). This damage counts as passive damage and is the base multiplier. It is affected by damage boost. The High-Dimensional Space fades after **4** Dimensional Collapses.

discharge.name: Confining Tune
discharge.description:
When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder** and create chains from another dimension to bind the target upon switching to this weapon, delaying them by **65%** for **3** seconds (ineffective against bosses in team play), dealing damage equal to **1660%** of ATK plus **87** to nearby targets, and becoming immune to damage for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

**Passive: Void Trace**
Confining Tune creates **1** Void Trace that launches coordinated attacks at the current locked-on target. Only **1** Void Trace may be active, and it fades after **20** seconds when not in combat.
For every **1** weapon of a different element or altered weapon equipped, increase Void Trace's damage dealt by **10%**. Void Trace's damage is also not affected by damage boosts, except for Inhabit, Confining Tune, and rare stats on titan equipment, and won't trigger additional attack effects.
Hold dodge when wielding **Purple Bamboo** to trigger Possession (unavailable in Apex League) and Possess Void Trace, gaining the ability to control its movements. During Possession, Coordinated Void becomes Void Trace's normal attack and skills.
While under Possession, Void Trace enters Rampage state, increasing speed, damage reduction, shatter, and weapon charge by **50%**. Its normal attack and its skill damage increase by the same percentage as its Max HP lost at the time.
**Coordinated Void**: A periodic coordinated attack from Void Trace, dealing damage equal to **165% to 300%** of Void Trace's ATK.
**Void Halo**: Deal damage equal to **100%** of Void Trace's ATK every second to nearby targets.
**Void Attack**: Tap normal attack to launch 4 consecutive attacks, each dealing damage equal to **240% to 385%** of Void Trace's ATK.
**Void Skill**: Consume **25%** of Void Trace's Max HP and deal damage equal to **1870% to 2040%** of Void Trace's ATK, increasing Void Trace's Crit Rate by **30%** for **60** seconds.
**Void Relief**: Can be triggered when Void Trace takes lethal damage, when the Wanderer equips or unequips Purple Bamboo, or when holding dodge during Possession.

**Passive: Dark Wretch**
When switching to Purple Bamboo from other weapons, Confining Tune will grant additional effects based on the element of the weapon.
**Frost**: Summon Darkness: Alabaster Elite and deal area damage equal to **500%** of ATK. Also, gain a shield equal to **60%** of Max HP for **30** seconds (unavailable in Apex League). Create a hail storm by the locked-on target, dealing damage equal to **420%** of ATK to nearby targets every second for **15** seconds. Counts as normal attack damage.
**Flame**: Summon Black Crow Dark Wretch and deal area damage equal to **500%** of ATK. Burn nearby targets, dealing damage equal to **240%** of ATK. Counts as passive damage.
**Volt**: Summon Longxiang Dark Wretch and deal damage equal to **500%** of ATK. When not under Possession, consume **5%** of Void Trace's Max HP every second and deal **50%** of the value as damage to nearby targets. Counts as normal attack damage (unavailable in Apex League).
**Physical**: Summon Darkness: Hornmane and deal area damage equal to **500%** of ATK. Gain sweeping for **30** seconds, dealing additional damage equal to **80%** of ATK to nearby targets on a critical hit. Counts as normal attack damage. Can only be triggered **1** time every **0.85** seconds.
**Altered**: Summon Darkness: Taotie and deal area damage equal to **525%** of ATK. Void Trace inherits an additional **100%** of the Wanderer's ATK. Deal additional damage equal to **2000%** of Void Trace's ATK to nearby targets during Void Relief. Counts as skill damage.

advancements.description:
**The Final Tune**: Increase ATK by **30%**. Activate by equipping **3** altered weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
**Imbue**: After switching to Purple Bamboo from another weapon, Purple Bamboo's damage element becomes that of the previous weapon.
**Inhabit**: The power of the Darkness is able to Inhabit any unlocked weapon. When Purple Bamboo is not deployed, the power of the Darkness can Inhabit any other weapon, increasing its damage dealt by **1%**. When Purple Bamboo is deployed, the power of the Darkness Inhabits Purple Bamboo, increasing the Wanderer's damage dealt by **15%**.

For every **1** star gained by the Darkness-Inhabited weapon, increase Inhabit's damage boost by an additional **1%**.
Dimensional Collapse deals increased damage equal to (**0.1%** of total actual damage dealt in High-Dimensional Space by the Wanderer (excluding Void Trace) plus **2,400%** of ATK) (counts as base multiplier, affected by damage boost).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

Void Trace inherits an additional **50%** of the Wanderer's ATK. When taking lethal damage while not under Possession, instead of being defeated, consume Void Trace and become immune to damage 1 time for a short period of time. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every **60** seconds, and has a lower priority when similar effects are present. This set effect works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

While in High-Dimensional Space, ignore **20%** of the target's resistances.
Up to **3** Void Abyss Currents can now be created.

Dimensional Collapse now deals damage equal to (**0.4%** of total actual damage dealt in High-Dimensional Space by the Wanderer (excluding Void Trace) plus **2,400%** of ATK) (counts as base multiplier, affected by damage boost).

linghan_ice.name: Alabaster Tiger
linghan_ice.description: With a flourish of sleeves and sword's dance divine, who can fathom the depths of this heart o' mine?

normals.name: Sword Art: Mooncutter
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **97.8%** of ATK plus **5** and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **129.4%** of ATK plus **7** and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **207.2%** of ATK plus **11** and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **125%** of ATK plus **7** and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **226%** of ATK plus **12** and draw in enemies to the front of the Wanderer.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to **253.6%** of ATK plus **13** and launch the target.
After triggering Sword Art: Mooncutter, tap and hold normal attack to trigger **Sword Art: Endless Snow**.

After any of **Alabaster Tiger's** normal attacks land a hit, apply **1** stack of **Crystalline Crack** to the target, dealing normal attack damage equal to **48%** of ATK every second for **15** seconds. Only **1** stack of Crystalline Crack can be applied to the same target every **4** seconds, stacking up to **3** times. The stacks will disappear one by one after the effect duration is over.

normals.name: Sword Art: Plum Swordcry
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **95.9%** of ATK plus **5**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **100.7%** of ATK plus **5**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **218.6%** of ATK plus **12**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **130%** of ATK plus **7**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **213.7%** of ATK plus **11**.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to **256.9%** of ATK plus **14**.

normals.name: Sword Art: Endless Snow
normals.description:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Sword Art: Endless Snow.
Use mind control to manipulate the sword while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to **140.8%** of ATK plus **7** to nearby targets.
When Sword Art: Endless Snow ends, release a powerful sword aura, dealing damage equal to **422.4%** of ATK plus **22** to nearby targets.

normals.name: Sword Art: Falling Frost
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Sword Art: Falling Frost.
While falling, deal damage equal to **75%** of ATK plus **4** each time the target is hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **366.7%** of ATK plus **19** to nearby targets.

normals.name: Light Steps
normals.description:
While the Wanderer is airborne after double jumping, tap jump to trigger Light Steps. Briefly dash upward before continuously gliding. While airborne, Light Steps can be used up to **2** times.
While on the ground, Light Steps recovers **1** use attempt every **10** seconds (switching areas, switching weapons, or unequipping **Alabaster Tiger** will reset the use attempts).

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

dodge.name: Sword Art: Cloud Shower
